trans-unit.source: Defines a point, associated with an activity execution status change, to be tracked that is in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um ponto, associado uma atividade execução alteração de estado, para ser controlado que está a ser o caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Sempre que o estado de execução de uma atividade é alterado, a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de estado de atividade para a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: An ActivityTrackPoint defines a point of interest in the potential execution path of a workflow, qualified by such an activity status event.
trans-unit.target: Um ActivityTrackPoint define um ponto de interesse no caminho de execução potencial de um fluxo de trabalho, qualificado por um evento de estado de atividade deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: An ActivityTrackPoint contains locations that are included in matching, locations that are excluded from matching, and the data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Um ActivityTrackPoint contenha localizações que estão incluídas na correspondência, as localizações que são excluídas da correspondência e os dados que devem ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.

trans-unit.source: You can add an ActivityTrackPoint to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when the specified set of activity status events occur.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um ActivityTrackPoint para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>para instruir a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução para enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>para o serviço de controlo quando ocorrer o conjunto especificado de eventos de estado de atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: A single ActivityTrackPoint may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um único ActivityTrackPoint pode corresponder a vários pontos de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> contains match conditions for a location or locations in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>contém as condições de correspondência para localizações no caminho de potenciais execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho ou de uma localização.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> to define locations that should be included in matching by the track point.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>objetos a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>Definir localizações que devem ser incluídas correspondente pelo ponto de registo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> to define locations that should be excluded from matching by the track point.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>objetos a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>Definir localizações que devem ser excluídas da correspondência pelo ponto de registo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>objetos e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>objetos a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>para especificar dados que devem ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: The extracted data will be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados extraídos serão incluídos em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>para especificar informações adicionais associadas com o ponto de registo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>

trans-unit.source: These annotations will be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> sent when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Estes anotações serão incluídas a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>enviado quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty track point.
trans-unit.target: O construtor predefinido inicializa um ponto de registo vazio.

trans-unit.source: No matching locations, excluded locations, data extracts or annotations are specified.
trans-unit.target: Não existem localizações correspondentes, localizações excluídas, extrai dados ou anotações estão especificadas.

trans-unit.source: You must configure the track point by adding at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de configurar o ponto de registo adicionando-a, pelo menos, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may optionally add objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, pode adicionar objetos a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de anotações associados com o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: You can add to Annotations to specify annotations to be returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> sent to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar anotações para especificar anotações devem ser devolvidos no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>enviados para o serviço de controlo quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: If Annotations is empty, no annotations are associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver vazia anotações, não anotações associadas com o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: As anotações são `strings` definir que contêm informações associadas com o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma anotação pode conter informações sobre o caminho de execução possíveis o fluxo de trabalho pode demorar a partir deste ponto de registo ou pode conter informações a apresentar numa interface de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be excluded from the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de localizações que deve ser excluído do ponto de controlar a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If any <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> in ExcludedLocations is matched for a particular activity status event, the track point will not be matched and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> will be sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>no ExcludedLocations é correspondido um evento de estado de atividade específica, não será possível corresponder o ponto de controlar e nenhum <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>serão enviados para o serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If ExcludedLocations is empty, there are no excluded locations.
trans-unit.target: Se ExcludedLocations está vazio, não existem nenhum localizações excluídas.

trans-unit.source: You can use ExcludedLocations to specifically exclude locations from being tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar ExcludedLocations para excluir especificamente localizações da que está a ser controlados pelo tempo de execução do controlo de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to track all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities except the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> property of "Code1", you can define an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> that matches all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities and add it to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se pretender controlar todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividades, exceto o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividade com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>propriedade "Código1", pode definir um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>que corresponde a todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividades e adicioná-lo a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Then you can define another <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> that matches <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> property set to "Code1" and add it to ExcludedLocations.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode definir outro <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>que corresponda ao <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividades com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>propriedade definida como "Código1" e adicioná-lo a ExcludedLocations.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The track point will then match all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities except the "Code1" activity.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de registo, em seguida, corresponderá a todas as <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividades exceto a atividade "Código1".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies locations to be excluded from the track point.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> que especifica as localizações a serem excluídos o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that specifies data to be extracted from the workflow instance and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que especifica os dados a ser extraído da instância de fluxo de trabalho e enviados para o serviço de controlo.

trans-unit.source: When a track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure can extract data from the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando é correspondido um ponto de registo, a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução pode extrair dados da instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure encapsulates the extracted data in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> objects that it puts in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução encapsula os dados extraídos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>objetos que coloca no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A>do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>que envia para o serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>

trans-unit.source: If Extracts is empty, no data will be extracted.
trans-unit.target: Se extrai estiver vazia, não existem dados serão extraídos.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity associated with this track point, and you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>objetos extrai para especificar os dados de membro que devem ser extraídos da atividade associado a este ponto de controlar e pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>objetos extrai para especificar os dados de membro que devem ser extraídos da atividade do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"></xref> that specifies the data to be extracted and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"> </xref> que especifica os dados a ser extraído e enviados para o serviço de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be included in matching for the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de localizações que devem ser incluídas correspondente para o ponto de controlar a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If MatchingLocations is empty, the track point cannot be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Se MatchingLocations tem um valor está vazio, o ponto de registo não pode ser correspondido pelo runtime infraestrutura de controlo.

trans-unit.source: You must add at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to MatchingLocations for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> to participate in matching.
trans-unit.target: Tem de adicionar pelo menos um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>para MatchingLocations tem um valor para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>participar no correspondente.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The track point will be matched if any <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> in MatchingLocations is matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is matched.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de registo será correspondido se qualquer <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>MatchingLocations tem um valor é correspondido pelo runtime controlo infraestrutura e não <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>é correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies the locations to be matched for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> que especifica as localizações de correspondência para o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.
